items.sentence: Tom was afraid that he might be expelled from school.
You should tell Tom that you aren't planning to swim.
Tom used my bicycle without asking me for permission.
Tell Tom that I'll be ready by the time he gets here.
I really wish that I knew where Tom put my briefcase.
I wish that I had married your sister instead of you.
I wish that they could find out what's wrong with me.
Tom said it would be a waste of time to study French.
Do you think that Tom was actually telling the truth?
I wish that I'd studied French harder in high school.
